body: Not a big fan of this interface....I kinda missed `-1` + `size_t` until I see `if (weight_index < fillers->size())`. Maybe just leave two separate helpers so we don't have to have an extra `if` in the implementation.
body_html: Not a big fan of this interface....I kinda missed -1 + size_t until I see if (weight_index < fillers->size()). Maybe just leave two separate helpers so we don't have to have an extra if in the implementation.
